articles.author: Darren Rovell
articles.title: Fanatics Acquires PointsBet's U.S. Business, Marking Its Official Foray Into Sports Betting - The Action Network
articles.description: Read about how Fanatics acquired PointsBet for $150 million on Sunday.

articles.author: Karl Rasmussen
articles.title: Ben Simmons Trolls 76ers After Their Game 7 Loss to Celtics - Sports Illustrated
articles.description: The Brooklyn Nets guard took to Instagram in the waning moments of the Sixers’ season-ending loss.
articles.content:
The 76ers were defeated by the Celtics in the second round of the playoffs, losing in Game 7 in what was ultimately a blowout. 
It seems ex-Sixers guard Ben Simmons, who left the team on bad terms w… [+1327 chars]
